Comment: I get they are cultists, but people in general - not just MAGAs - want action from politicians, hopefully for the better but even just for action's sake. What is one of the largest complaints you see about the Democratic party from members? They aren't doing enough. AOC, Bernie, Pritzker, Hogg, and a few others are getting positive press precisely because they are out there. If I see one more comment that says "The Dems aren't in power in any branch so WhAt Do YoU wAnT tHeM tO dO?" I'll scream. Something. Anything. Just move.

Comment: True, they've postured and pretended for years, putting on airs about patriotism, American exceptionalism, etc. But the self-mythologizing is merely a shell, and that shell is hollowed out and becoming brittle and untenable. This spray-tanned ignoramus is the culmination, and I can scarcely see how they'll maintain the air of legitimacy after their actions and policies inevitably give way to the atrocities that lie ahead of us.  Their 50+ year plan for domination is coming to a head, and they have an inept, error-prone, and fraudulent carnival huckster running the show. You can fool some of the people all of the time, all of the people some of the time, but you can't fool all of the people all of the time.
Author: dietTAB
